property.name: ticket_count
property.comment: the number of tickets created on the project.

query.name: list
query.comment: Get the list of projects that the current user can update
query.sql: SELECT project.id, project.name, project.status, project.create_date, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM jason_ticket AS ticket WHERE ticket.project_id = project.id) FROM jason_project AS project INNER JOIN awa_acl AS acl ON acl.entity_id = project.id AND acl.entity_type = :project_table AND acl.user_id = :user_id AND acl.permission = $permission[project-update] ORDER BY project.create_date DESC LIMIT :count OFFSET :first
query.sql-count: SELECT count(project.id) FROM jason_project AS project INNER JOIN awa_acl AS acl ON acl.entity_id = project.id AND acl.entity_type = :project_table AND acl.user_id = :user_id AND acl.permission = $permission[project-update]

query.name: list-tag-filter
query.comment: Get the list of tickets that the current user can update
query.sql: SELECT project.id, project.name, project.status, project.create_date FROM jason_project AS project INNER JOIN awa_tagged_entity AS e ON e.for_entity_id = project.id AND e.entity_type = :project_table AND e.tag_id = :tag INNER JOIN awa_acl AS acl ON acl.entity_id = project.id AND acl.entity_type = :table AND acl.user_id = :user_id AND acl.permission = $permission[project-update] ORDER BY project.create_date DESC LIMIT :first, :last
query.sql-count: SELECT count(ticket.id) FROM jason_ticket AS ticket INNER JOIN awa_tagged_entity AS e ON e.for_entity_id = ticket.project_id AND e.entity_type = :ticket_table AND e.tag_id = :tag INNER JOIN awa_acl AS acl ON acl.entity_id = ticket.id AND acl.entity_type = :project_table AND acl.user_id = :user_id AND acl.permission = $permission[project-update] WHERE ticket.project_id = :project_id AND :ticket_filter
